single-links.description: Base link style that is used almost universally.
A link style modification with our default text color.

Applies an important, destructive red to the base style.

descendent-anchors.name: base
descendent-anchors.description: A consistent link style is applied to all descendent anchors.

descendent-anchors.name: default
descendent-anchors.description: All descendent links receive s-link’s default styling.

descendent-anchors.name: grayscale
descendent-anchors.description: Applies gray styling to all descendent links.

descendent-anchors.name: muted
descendent-anchors.description: Applies a visually muted style to all descendent links.

descendent-anchors.name: danger
descendent-anchors.description: Applies an important, destructive red to all descendent links.

descendent-anchors.name: underlined
descendent-anchors.description: Applies an underline to all descendent links.

descendent-anchors.name: inherit
descendent-anchors.description: Applies the parent element’s text color to all descendent links.

Applies a border to the right of the selected state.
Applies a border to the left of the selected state.
